1465430.name: THE GAME OF LIFE 2: Fairytale Kingdom World
1465430.description:
Embark on a magical quest through the Fairytale Kingdom World! Conjure up new outfits, vehicles, jobs, properties, avatars and more. Escape to a mythical land and write your own tale of heroism, magic and adventure!

Become a druid, fairy, elf or even a dragon in this enchanted new world. Set forth on a noble quest, study at the Wizard Academy or become a Knight in shining armour. Sail away on the Elven Leaf Boat, take to the skies on your Flying Broomstick or gallop across the board on your mighty Knight’s Horse. Your happily ever after awaits, and it’s as fantastical as you want it to be!

It’s a magical world with enchanting opportunities to live your dream life exactly as you want. Join your friends and family on a mystical adventure, where dreams come true!

INCLUDES:

  • A NEW WORLD TO EXPLORE – Write your own legend as you venture across an all-new board.

  • THEMED COSMETICS – Six magical outfits, six fairytale avatars and four enchanted vehicles.

  • CRAFT YOUR STORY – Spin your own fairytale, whether you study at the Wizard Academy or travel the land as an elf!

Find your happy ending when you add the Fairytale Kingdom World to your collection now!
1465430.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
